#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define s(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
#define loop(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define loopi(i,a,b) for(i=b;i>=a;i--)
#define mod 1000000007
ll power(ll b, ll e) {
    ll p = 1;
    while (e > 0) {
        if(e&1) {
            p = (p*b)%mod;
        }
        e = e>>1;
        b = (b * b)%mod;
    }
    return p;
}
int main()
{
 ll i,j,k,b,c,t,cs=0;
 //s(t);
 // while(t--)
  {
   double n,m,a;
    scanf("%lf %lf %lf",&n,&m,&a);
    ll ans= ceil(n/a)*ceil(m/a);
    cout<<ans<<endl;
   }
return 0;
}
